name: Rail Rumble
description:
"Rail Rumble is an action-packed multiplayer brawler set on a runaway train with fast paced, all melee combat which really brings the brawl back to brawlers!"

So get comfy, grab a controller, and punch your friends! *

* In game. We hold no responsibility for any physical violence that may occur.

Key Features:
  • Local Multiplayer (2-4 Players)
  • Controller only support
  • Pixel art style
  • Sink your friendships!
Release Date: 13/11/2015Platform: Windows/PCPrice: FreeContact Info: axolocelot@gmail.com[Xbox controllers are necessary for gameplay]
